about.title: Hi there!
about.description_p_one: My name is Maryna. In 2017, I created the brand mariam crochet jewelry.
about.description_p_two: This is my small universe that follows the philosophy of healing through beauty. It also nurtures a sense of tenderness, attention to details, and enthusiasm for handmade creations.
about.description_p_three: Everything I do is object poetry. A visual dance of joy. In each piece, you can feel the beat of my heart and the trembling of my soul, which I want to share with you!
about.description_ending: I am sincerely happy for every meeting, and with great love, I will create beauty for you!
about.collections_description: For more inspiration and examples of my works, I invite you to explore the collections.
about.shop_description: Feel free to check out the handmade jewelry and clothing pieces that are ready and waiting for buying.

collections.header: The collections feature examples of works, inspiration, and ideas for custom product orders

shop.header: In the shop all clothing and jewelry pieces are in stock and available for purchase

checkout_page.title: Checkout
checkout_page.other_messenger: Other (add in section for commets below)

confirmation_page.paragraph_one: I'll reach out to you as soon as possible. An email with order details has been sent to email address you provided.
confirmation_page.paragraph_two: Meanwhile I invite you to check my Instagram and Facebook page.

confirmation_email.email_ending: Thank you for the order. I'll reach out to you as soon as possible. Meanwhile I invite you to check my social media.

footer.info: mariam crochet jewelry is a Ukrainian clothing and crocheted jewelry brand founded by designer Maryna Kambur. Handcrafted lovingly in Kyiv, Ukraine.
